entry.title: Monday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning this morning then changing to a few rain showers near noon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon then becoming northwest 20. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Monday 10 April 2023
